titles.title: To reaffirm the applicability of the Act of June 18, 1934, to the Samish Indian Nation, and for other purposes.
To reaffirm the applicability of the Act of June 18, 1934, to the Samish Indian Nation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill applies the Indian Reorganization Act to the Samish Indian Nation.
